testimonials.title: Employee Testimonials
testimonials.description: Our employees are our greatest asset. Here's what they have to say about working at OpenObserve.

items.quote: Working at OpenObserve has been the highlight of my career. The problems we solve, the engineering culture, and the constantly growing team of brilliant colleagues.
items.name: Jamie Smith

items.quote: The culture at OpenObserve is truly special. There's a perfect balance of autonomy and accountability. I feel empowered about our wellbeing and growth.
items.name: Raj Patel

items.quote: As a remote employee, I was worried about missing out on the connection and camaraderie. But the art of building strong relationships is cultivated at the core of this company.
items.name: Elena Lopez

technology.description: We're building cutting-edge technology that solves real problems in observability. Here's what you'll work with:

features.title: Modern Stack
features.description: Our platform is built with Rust, Go, and TypeScript, leveraging the best tools for performance, reliability, and developer experience.

features.title: Cloud Native
features.description: We embrace Kubernetes, containerization, and cloud-native principles to build scalable, resilient systems.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: We believe in the power of open source and contribute back to the community that supports us.
